content: a total of 12 row in stockinette keeping a garter stitch border knit the first 8 stitches and last 8 stitches of every row section 5 thinner stripe sparkles cut mc and pick up cc row 1 knit row 2 k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 drop cc and pick up sparkly yarn carry cc up the sides for less weaving later row 3 knit row 4 k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 pattern by candyloucreations | candylou com | instagram @candyloucreations twinkle toes baby blanket knitting pattern cut sparkly yarn and pick up cc row 5 knit row 6 k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 cut cc and pick up mc repeat sections 2 3 4 and 5 until desired length ending on section 2 with mc top border section with mc knit 12 row in garter stitch knit every row bind off with a stretchy bind off method and weave in ends stretchy method of binding off knit the first 2 stitches insert the left needle into the 2 stitches on the right needle and knit them together with one stitch on the needle knit the next stitch and then knit these 2 stitches together continue this until all stitches are off your needles cut the yarn pull through the last loop weave in ends pattern by candyloucreations | candylou com | instagram @candyloucreations twinkle toes baby blanket knitting pattern for tutorials of stitches and weaving in ends please go to candylou com/blog and each pattern will have these skills linked to tutorials by my favorite knitters i d love to see your finished projects on instagram please tag me @candyloucreations and share the love ❣ read more about my knitting patterns at candylou com/blog pattern by candyloucreations | candylou com | instagram @candyloucreations
